The Finepix is better for the above mentioned reasons.-GE x500(?) 16mp: Not entirely sure about the model but I bought it because it looks similar to the finepix and I thought it might be one of those instances where, though the products were from different companies, the manufacturer might be the same so I assumed performance would be similar. Plus, more mp. Not so much. Not a bad camera but the zoom/close up focus was poor and I never got shots near as good as with the finepix. Still haven't figured out the menus either.The Finepix s1000fd I'm buying off Amazon is actually the second one I bought. The first one I got used off ebay and worked great until I dropped it... twice. The first time was on a hard basement floor. The only damage it showed was that one of the prongs that held the battery door shut broke off. It didn't quite close all the way but the battery door still made contact and the camera still worked fine. The screen was fine and the lens didn't get knocked out of place. The second time I dropped it the other prong broke off so now the camera won't stay on. I bought the GE as a replacement but it wasn't as good so I'm going back to the finepix. I will be posting some pictures that I was able to take with the camera. Not sure how many Amazon will let me post but I'll label them with my user name.

Reviews.Title: dropped in the mud?
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Lowell "Formerly Famous"
Reviews.Content: The camera was purchased for parts for a pristine unit that I have. I was disappointed with the missing lens-cap and it appears as if the camera was dropped in mud. Hmmmm.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Tiffany K.
Reviews.Content: This was a great find! I bought if for my boyfriend for his birthday. I had previously owned this model but lost it on vacation. SO glad I'm reunited with this great camera!

Reviews.Title: Great Photos, Bad Video
Reviews.Author: Chef Ricardo Ibarra
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera back in 2008 and it's still working perfectly, I am extremely satisfied with it, sometimes it takes a couple of second to take a picture but the results are really really good, the only bad thing is that the video quality is really bad, only 460x320, I can't blame the camera since I bought it without knowing this, so just take it into consideration if you're going to be filming a lot with it. So bad video, but excellent product hardware and great pictures, many features and very good zoom.

Reviews.Title: Best digital camera I have ever owned!
Reviews.Author: Stormy1
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Fuji S1000 digital camera in late 2009 and I should have got 2 of them instead of one. This digital camera did a fantastic job of taking excellent photos in most situations extremely well. The flash worked well in low-light situations also. Inside photos sometimes were a bit "washed out" with the flash, depending on the lighting situation in the room.I used this digital camera heavily for 2 years and it did a wonderful job before it died on me in late 2011. I got so many wonderful photos just using the AUTO mode with this camera.The pros on this camera are plentiful: pretty easy to use, looks nice, decent 12X optical zoom, good flash, excellent photo quality, optical viewfinder, & no shutter lag with this camera.The cons on this camera that I noticed: some inside photos were a bit "washed out" using the flashBattery life is good with this camera and it uses 4 "AA" batteries. If you don't use the flash too much and use the optical viewfinder [which I prefer to use over the LCD viewfinder anyways], the batteries will last quite awhile in this camera.Video quality is decent and has sound with it.I thought of getting another one now, but it costs over 2 times the cost I paid for this camera as new in late 2009 and that bothers me. I am still looking for a decent replacement for this camera and the newer Fuji digital cameras do not seem to meet the photo quality standards that the S1000 had and I used the identical settings on the newer Fuji S2950 digital camera that I wanted to use as the replacement for this model....but the newer S2950 fell short of my expectations.To make a long story short, I recommend the Fuji S1000 digital camera to anybody that is fairly new to the digital camera scene or somebody that wants pretty good photos in most situations with a camera that is rather easy to use at a faily low cost...well it was faily low cost when I purchased it in late 2009.

Reviews.Title: Camera Purchase
Reviews.Author: Chief
Reviews.Content: I really like the camera it came as described and works great. As a novice photographer this camera is more than I could have wished for, it is fast and takes great pictures. I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Tanya T. Justus
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a replacement for an older one.  I have been very pleased with the camera on all accounts.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm
Reviews.Author: Allan Hawkins V
Reviews.Content: After 3 years and a half, I can say this camera is INDESTRUCTIBLE! Great camera at all.Saludos, Allan.

Reviews.Title: overall a pretty good camera
Reviews.Author: bob
Reviews.Content: this camera is a good camera. it takes clear pictures and is fairly easy to operate. it is heavy and some of the controls are akwardlyplaced. It is good inside as well as outside.It is suitable for amatuers and families, but not for somebody who wants to be a serious photographer.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: gwleader
Reviews.Content: It is an excellent camera for the price.  Picture quality is good. You can not put filters on it, and the delay between pushing the shutter button and the taking of the picture is annoying at best.  These are things common in this price range and you have to spend more to get more.

Reviews.Title: 18 months with camera
Reviews.Author: Penny Smith "Penny"
Reviews.Content: I loved my camera (purchased March 2009) and it took beautiful pictures.  I bought my last Fuji camera in 2000 for a trip to the Amazon and it still works.  This product is now dead!  It will not work other than to turn on and immediately stop doing anything.  I had to take batteries out and put them back in to get it to turn off.  To fix it would cost almost my original price so won't be doing that.  18 months is a very short lifetime compared to the cameras I still have.  So, my new camera is not a Fuji

Reviews.Title: Great Camera For The Price
Reviews.Author: Redd
Reviews.Content: Just as advertised. For the price youcan't beat it. Great picture quality and simple to use plus gives you manual capabilities.

Reviews.Title: Never any clear pictures
Reviews.Author: Mellen Zeitz "Mellen"
Reviews.Content: I have a Fuji FinePix S1000fd. I bought this camera to replace the old 5200 that I had. The 5200 worked really well. I set everything on auto and never had a problem. With this new camera, I can never get a clear shot unless outside and up close. The zoom is not big enough to take a good shot in the gym at gymnastic meets. My pictures in the house mostly turn out yellow. When I focus, it seems as if nothing is really in focus. I used to have a Minolta, but changed to a Fuji because of its size and portability. I am now going to try the Sony 330 L, because I have lots of lens from the old Minolta. I wish that I had returned this camera within the 30 days. I just hate it when everyone tells me to read the manual, or it is just the lighting. I do know how to work a camera. I have tried every setting on the SP1 and SP2 just to see the difference and still everything is grainy. I can never get a realy clear, crisp picture. Anyone have a Sony Alpha 330 L for sale really cheap.

Reviews.Title: An excellent buy at its pricepoint
Reviews.Author: Joel Cohen
Reviews.Content: I have owned this camera for over a year now,  during which I have taken hundreds of photos,  including product shots for ebay,  performance candids of the musical groups I have been associated with, and various travel shots.  Dozens of these have appeared on the web,  and two were accepted for publication by the New York Times last summer.More recently,  I have purchased a wide-carriage photo printer and have been running off enlargements,  including quite a few 13 x 19's.My results across the board run from good to excellent. On the minus side,  there are no threads for filters; the manual controls can be tricky to use; the shutter lag is a big pain under certain circumstances;  and when you blow up a file to 13 x 19 you may notice a little falling off of sharpness and resolution at the edges of your print.  But OMG,  how much can you expect from a $200 camera? A few years ago,  when I was shooting with film,  I could only dream of getting extra large prints of this quality from a 35 mm neg.A fine product at a very attractive price.

Reviews.Title: really good camera
Reviews.Author: Kathie R. Mashni
Reviews.Content: this is a really good camera. it has a lot of features and takes really high resolution and clear pictures. the pictures are too large for my purposes, hard to manage online, but i confess i have not really looked into how to change the settings, and suspect i could shrink it by asking for lower resolution.the panorama ability is really fun. i would definitely buy this product agian. this is my second Fuji camera. i loved the first one, but was robbed.my next camera will be a Fuji, i am very pleased with this companies products.

Reviews.Title: Canera
Reviews.Author: Barry Dean Brubaker
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for someone else but he said it is a great camera. I saw some of the pictures he took and they looked really good.

Reviews.Title: Love This Camera
Reviews.Author: Rev. George T. Cox
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased for my wife after her old camera bit the dust after taking pictures in a haunted building.(True)Out of the Box this camera has performed flawlessly, the automatic function is wonderful for those quick shots, which by the way are beautiful in focus with correct light balance. It also has the capability to manually set up for specific shots for the purist. My wife takes lots of pictures and the 2gb SD card included allows one to shoot all day. She has filled the card once with close to 800 pictures on the highest definition. Many more could be taken at the two lower settings, but she likes to play with the photoes in Picassa, and Photoshop. The high definition allows her to do almost anything she wants. Additionally the back view screen is wonderfully bright even in low light, the use of the view finder is almost never necessary. In Low light situations it will take a very nice pic with ambient lighting. Admittedly, the flash is needed in dark conditions and for shadow fill outdoors, (under trees for example).Would recommend this camera to anyone who wants to take great pictures. It has great value to price paid, due to the many functions built in. When my existing camera goes belly up this camera or current version will be the one I look for.

Reviews.Title: Much better cameras out there.
Reviews.Author: J. Hazzard
Reviews.Content: Prone to freeze and has compatibility issues with most memory cards. Mine gave up on me while I was adjusting the white balance, motherboard failure.

Reviews.Title: Could be better
Reviews.Author: Steven Bersig
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for just over a month now and for the most part its a great camera. But the manual leaves you lost on doing different things so the photographs don't turn out as good as they could.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm Finepix S1000fd
Reviews.Author: ShirleyAnn "ShirleyAnn"
Reviews.Content: I am impressed with the 12x zoom. I am now able to take long range pix that are clear and sharp. Another thing I truly love about this camera is the length of time the batteries last. I took Hundreds (aprox 600) before I needed to replace the batteries, that is awewome.

Reviews.Title: A MAGNIFICENT OBSESSION
Reviews.Author: Niala
Reviews.Content: That's the term that comes to my mind when I think of this camera. A steal of a deal.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Debra Stewart
Reviews.Content: Fujifilm Finepix S1000fd 10MP Digital Camera with 12x Optical Zoom This camera is great

Reviews.Title: Fugifilm Finepix S1000fd
Reviews.Author: Thomas M. Croskrey
Reviews.Content: Awsome Camera, this little unit puts the "big boys" to shame!  This is a great camera for a great price, it can "keep up" with cameras that cost 4 or 5 times as much.  Buy it, you wont be sorry.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Michael K. Hummel
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for about 6 months. I have taken over 6,000 pictures with it and know the in and outs of the camera. I love most of the features and the way my pictures look. I have taken pics at night, in the fog, and in most conditions. It has a feature that allows you to take multi pics at once in the full 10mp. I use this feature all the time and it helps me get the picture I want. The only con to this camera is not being able to auto focus. I do like to take pictures of birds and not being able to focus has been a down side. Overall for the price, I love this camera and I take it with me where ever I go.******* update***** after 18,000 pictures, falling a great distance on a hike, the camera is no more. Bought a newer version... that was a mistake. I will be buy a used S1000FD. I am convinced that this is the best camera ever made.

Reviews.Title: Love Fuji again!!
Reviews.Author: D. Wilcox
Reviews.Content: I have another Fujifilm camera that has been all over the world with me... including Iraq. It held up wonderfully, so I decided to give this one a shot and so far so good! I am surely not disappointed.I would recommend this camera to someone who wants to bump up from a basic digital - without getting into SLRs.

Reviews.Title: good camera and quick service
Reviews.Author: Qiang Liu
Reviews.Content: I got this good camera, and also very quick deliver service with careful package. Thanks! I like it!

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Sylvia M. Thames
Reviews.Content: The first camera I received did not work properly, but after returning it, I received the second one within two days of my request.  This one is GREAT!  The pictures are clear and concise.  The camera is easy to operate.  I couldn't be happier.  The price was excellent as well.

Reviews.Title: Fuji Fine Pix 1000
Reviews.Author: James Louis Menapace
Reviews.Content: Fujifilm Finepix S1000fd 10MP Digital Camera with 12x Optical Zoom  I have been truly happy with this camera; this is the second Fuji I have owned and very pleased with the distinct and fine prints I have been receiving.  I still have much to learn about my Fuji and I know I have an excellent camera for all types of pictures.  I am pleased with the 12 zoom and it ease of use.  I have no hesitation in recommending this camera to those who enjoy taking family and friends pictures as well as landscapes and sunsets.

Reviews.Title: needs manual
Reviews.Author: D. tineo
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera especially for the price but if you don't already know how to use a camera with all the possible adjustments, you need to get a hold of a photo book somewhere 'cause this one does not come with an owners manual.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to use
Reviews.Author: S. Ronald
Reviews.Content: Looking for a simple digital camera with lots of options easy to use, this is the one.  Very happy!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the money
Reviews.Author: K. Bryant
Reviews.Content: Overall I've been happy with this camera. My most favorite part is the macro feature. It's surprisingly good for the price. Also, I've been impressed with the video feature. Instead of toting around two cameras, I just take this one to events and such. Here are some photo samples: [...] I still would like to have a DSLR, but for right now this one is okay.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Pamela J. Meurer
Reviews.Content: I am a new gramma and love this camera. It is so easy to use and takes the best shots (you should see the 1 hour old pictures!) Could not ask for a better camera. I have had 2 digital cameras in the past and this is by far the most superior.

Reviews.Title: Excelente Producto!!!
Reviews.Author: Angel Perez "Angel Perez"
Reviews.Content: Excelente Producto. Muy buena resolucion el tamaño es perfecto y el zoom es tremendo.Y lo mejor es el precio.

Reviews.Title: middle use camera
Reviews.Author: common people
Reviews.Content: This camera is very good in natural or ligthed conditions and it has a 12x zoom.It works better in preselected position or manual.The auto settings causes color changes in faces if they're not well lit.The zoom is too quick, and it does not change if you use the camera in video mode.I'll not recommend it as a "point and shoot" camera.The price is ok.

Reviews.Title: Fuji you've failed me
Reviews.Author: C. A. Sinclair "doctorcreation"
Reviews.Content: I had a Fuji FinePix 5100 for years and LOVED it (The flash eventually went out). Based on this wonderful product I decided to get a FinePix S1000. What a let down. Indoor pictures are terrible, the colors are waaaaay off. I have to adjust EVERY image I take indoors. The camera does fine in natural light and video looks fine. 90% of what I do is pics indoors of family events so I am tremendously let down. I have tried every setting and spent a lot of time learning how to optimize the camera and still no luck. Its to the point I use my daughters $100 Samsung most of the time. Very disappointed in Fuji.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, high quality photos
Reviews.Author: Hunter K.
Reviews.Content: My wife bought this camera for us about a month ago and we've been very pleased with it. It has the right amount of flexibility for almost any purpose but the complexity level isn't too much for novice users. Good low-light response, though our pictures tend to come out a bit yellow if we don't add more white light. My only real complaint is that the image stabilization is lacking-to-nonexistent, which leads to quite a few blurry images unless you use a tripod or some other manual stabilization.

Reviews.Title: Great pics
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Capuano
Reviews.Content: So far I love this camera.  Takes really great pics.  Has a great zoom without blur.  I like the fact that the lens has a detachable cover rather than an automatic open/close cover that usually stops working in a half open position.  Only thing I would of liked to have is a flash when taking panoramic pictures.  Great deal and great price.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: Lynch
Reviews.Content: It was a good product for someone who is taking family pictures.  It is easy to use and takes great pictures.  We like the zoom feature and the buttons allow quick access to all functions.  There aren't long menus to get to the screen you need.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase this year!
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Kinney
Reviews.Content: I researched this camera for about 2 months before purchasing. I can truly say, it's awesome. I was previously using a 2 megapixel sony digital camera. After taking pic's with the Fuji, my photos have literally come alive! I'm not a photographer, but purchased the camera for family gatherings, reunions, etc.... I'm so glad that I made this purchase. The quality is awesome, and for the money, you can't beat it. HANDS DOWN@!!!

Reviews.Title: GREAT LITTLE CAMERA!!!!
Reviews.Author: Glenn X
Reviews.Content: This Fuji finepix s1000 is a great little camera! The pictures are GREAT looking & easy to operate! You really have to play around with this camera to get it's full potential, remember it's NOT a disposable camera! The zoom is nice, but you need a tripod for extreme zooming. Also, the price is wonderful for this step up camera, especially if your budget conscious like me, in this time where our economy is heading south! Anyway, lots of PROs, very few cons, such as needing a tripod for extreme zooming, no thread for filters to protect the lens, & a loose lens cover. But OVERALL HIGHLY recommended especially for the price!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Lizette Ross "Liz"
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera you just have to get used to it.  I love the fact that the shutter speed isn't forever.  Better than most smaller cameras.  But it does have some stabilization problems.  So be prepared.  Otherwise for the price it was a GREAT BUY!

Reviews.Title: Technical dream camera
Reviews.Author: Lowell D. Felps
Reviews.Content: Bought this digital camera for my son, who loves the camera.  The ability to "stich" panoramic views, the auto-stabilization feature, 10 MP, and the 12X zoom make this camera much more than most camers at its price.  A great buy forless than $200.

Reviews.Title: fujifilm finepix s1000fd
Reviews.Author: Duane V. Silvey
Reviews.Content: So far this camera for the price has been outstanding. It does everything that it is advertised to do. I have taken movies sports shots with the multi shot mode and all have worked fantastic. The only draw back is when you zoom out to the max you need to have it on a tripod to get a good picture because it is impossible for me to hold it still to get a good picture. I also purchased the Transcend 8 GB SDHC Class 6 Flash Memory Card and it works flawlessly with the camera. I did as was suggested by another reviewer and formatted the card before taking any pictures.I couldn't be happier with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: FujiFilm Camera
Reviews.Author: Angela N. Coffee
Reviews.Content: I've only had the camera for a little while, but it seems to be exactly what I wanted.  I do have alot to learn about it.  I bought a 4gb SD card for it and I was very surprised at how many pictures that it would hold.  Like 780 or so even when I'm using the 10mp setting.  All in all, I love the camera!!!

Reviews.Title: Overjoyed
Reviews.Author: Rcallen
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing!!!!. It takes fantastic pics and is completely user friendly.  The cost was better than any other I found with 10 mega pixels and the grip is an added bonus.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: IMPhoto
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome intermediate camera! My daughter is taking a photography class in high school and this camera is perfect. It has both automatic and manual settings and boh are easy to navigate.  It takes crisp clear pictures. This camera is an excellent value for someone who wants to go beyond the point and shoot camera, but doesn't need a full on SLR.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Just Techie
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these in SEP and it is a great product for the price. I used it at our New Years Eve party and did 45 min. of video on a single set of batteries with power to spare. Great battery life, pictures, video and all around performance.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm Did It !!
Reviews.Author: Stephen Cox
Reviews.Content: I have always owned Kodak Digital Cameras and was quite skeptical about buying another brand. But the Fujufilm Finepix S1000fd surpassed my expectations!!!Although it does use batteries at a faster rate than any of my Kodak cameras, I simply bought a good supply of re-chargables and take them wherever I take the camera.The nicest part about this particular camera is that I can set it on AUTO and even my grand children can use it. No need for them to learn about all of the buttons....It does really good movies. Obviously not as good as a regular movie camera, but for being built into a digital camera it really does a good job, we watch the movies on our t.v. which the camera hooks up too.All, in all, I am not dissapointed in the money I spent for this camera. It borderlines a professional model while keeping most things quite simple. Would not hesitate to recommend this camera to my friends. Matter of fact, I have been showing it off at every opportunity I get.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Ruth Lumley
Reviews.Content: after I read the owners manual played with the camera and figured out everything I just love it, the zoom is awesome, pictures are great, I like to take scenery pictures, this camera is perfect

Reviews.Title: great value for the price
Reviews.Author: Flor M
Reviews.Content: My sister is starting to learn photography and she wanted a semi-professional camera... altough she is still learning she got great photos since the very first time she used it, great size ... eventough looks like a big heavy camera is not like that at all.. its size is just perfect and is not heavy at all. Last but not least excelent price for a semi-pro camera my sister is really happy with it. Just make sure you buy at least 4 rechargable batteries and its charger if you dont want to be spending your money in batteries, altough the last enough time if you use it a lot you will definetly need to change batteries from time to time.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm Finepix S1000fd review
Reviews.Author: Robert P. Grossmann "Jaeger"
Reviews.Content: The Finepix S1000fd is an easy to use camera that has all of the features of a more expensive model.  The zoom feature makes the camera very versatile under a number of conditions and the resulting pictures are very clear.  I would recommend this camera to friends and family were they to be looking for a new instrument to buy.

Reviews.Title: fujifilm fine pix s1000fd
Reviews.Author: G. moon
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for about two months and I would'nt trade it for any other. it takes great pics. I took some of water birds in flight and there was no blurring motion at all. took the pic on auto with no adjustments.

Reviews.Title: Picture Perfect
Reviews.Author: P. Walters "Peewee"
Reviews.Content: Really impressed with this camera, it certainly out performs the 3mp Olympus that I brought with me from Australia. Photos are clear even when taken in poor light without flash.  So far have only taken around 350 shots at a wedding last weekend and extremely happy with the results.  Would I recomend this camera??  YES!Delivery was fast, well packaged and price was amazing.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Adam W. Ackerman
Reviews.Content: i purchased this camera to take pictures of my daughter whom was born 15 weeks early and is in a incubator.  it took some playing with the different options to find the best mode to use, but finally settled on the flower setting.  i must say, i personally have never taken a better picture.  i give this a 4 because i love it, i would have given it a 5 except i can see how some people may have issues with finding the best setting, but for the money, this is a nice camera.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Seller and Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: N. Smith "keepitsimple"
Reviews.Content: This is the ultimate point and click camera!!!  The zoom is just incredible and operation is at the simplest level.  I couldn't be happier with this Fuji camera and the seller was just the BEST!!!

Reviews.Title: Estupenda camara!!!!
Reviews.Author: Junior Mateo Marte
Reviews.Content: Es una camara que cumple con su cometido. No tienes que ser un profesional para utilizarla.Buena camara.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal...Beautiful Pictures
Reviews.Author: Stacey Knox
Reviews.Content: I still don't like the feel of the newer tiny cameras and I can't keep my hands still enough. So this camera feels nice in hand and takes beautiful pics. I retired my fugi s5100 (4.0 mega pix) and bought this s1000 (10.0 mega pix). I can't say I see a difference in quality, but maybe thats because my old one was awesome too.My only downside would be where the on/off switch is and also the zoom. I liked the old positioning better.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Whiteford "Musical Moose"
Reviews.Content: I received this camera for an early Christmas present.  I had only ever used a point-and-shoot 35mm in the 80's and, for the last few years, my 1.3 mp cell phone camera.  It takes good pictures for what it is, but this is obviously a marked improvement.  I've had it a few weeks now and haven't used all the settings and features, but its pretty easy to figure out.  The full manual comes on a CD-Rom, making the font bigger and easier to read, and navigate.  The focus does work a bit slowly at times, but I've adjusted to it easily.  Indoor photography can be blurry sometimes without flash and when the subject is moving, but that's to be expected, especially when not using a tripod.  I have tried the "SP1" setting or "party" setting in low light with pretty good results at a choir concert.  The size is also very good- fits my hands well; I am about 5 ft tall.  I put pins in the neck strap, though, because one side came undone while wearing it and nearly fell to the ground!  Overall, this is a great, fun camera that takes good pictures, for the non-professional.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: C. Grove "Man-O-the-Hour"
Reviews.Content: This class of camera came about in order to satisfy the dreams of those who would have a DSLR... IF they could afford it and the lenses they'd like.I bought this camera for my girlfriend. I have the more expensive (of course) Canon SX10 IS. This Fuji has most of the same features (a bit less zoom) for less then half the price.Should I complain that it does not have a hotshoe or connection for an external flash?? Considering, as I said, that this class of camera is aimed at photographers who would have bought an SLR if they could, I DO think that this is an oversight.I am looking into slave-flashes and adapter brackets to make up for this issue.The quality is pretty good with few complaints. The auto-focus is a bit slow. It could also use a remote shutter release. Complaints, however, are simply the result of the camera's price-point. It's simply a great camera for the price!

Reviews.Title: Excellent For Work & Play!
Reviews.Author: Detroit Larry
Reviews.Content: This camera goes with me to work everyday; taking photos of construction sites and home inspections.  It also went with us last month on our 15th Wedding Anniversary to Maui, Hawaii.  We took hundreds of pictures!!  Sunrises from a cold volcano peak, sunsets from the beach, and full moons setting on the ocean.  Even the night time views from our balcony... without a tripod.  And, the price is right!!!!!-Lawrence, Detroit

Reviews.Title: Good enough for the price
Reviews.Author: Fabian Blandon "Fabian"
Reviews.Content: If you like the style of the traditional cameras (and not the usual small "cigarette-box" size) or just don't want to spend a lot on a professional device, this is right for you. Enjoy the great quality from a known brand (Fuji), take pictures in many customized formats or record your own videos with sound. This is my 3rd Fuji camera and they keep on doing things better everyday.

Reviews.Title: Nothing but good!
Reviews.Author: Allen L. Heinrich
Reviews.Content: Love this camera! I've seen others that are far larger and more expensive that don't take near the quality of photos- and videos! Recently during my daughter's musical, no flash cameras allowed. This camera did awesome under low light conditions. Many extra features with keep me interested for a long time learning and using!!

Reviews.Title: Better than Fuji S3800
Reviews.Author: A. Ugalde
Reviews.Content: This is my second Fuji Camera, my first was a Fuji S3800 with 6X opticalThe S1000 is a litle more complicated to use, just to many opcions, plus the manual is very small and all the information are in the CD. IS a real good for the price and the zoom is fantastic

Reviews.Title: Solid Starter Camera
Reviews.Author: A. Vizcarra "The Soul Creative"
Reviews.Content: I think this is a really good starter digital camera. Since it comes with manual controls if gives you the best of both worlds. I've been using it for student photo projects and it works really well. I was using Olympus & Polaroid cameras before and they do not compare. I like the sturdiness, look and feel and the simplified on screen menu and the listed features are truly great especially at this price. It gives it's more expensive counterparts a run for their money. I must (surprisingly) say that I am now a Fujifilm fan. If you are looking for a step up from film, a step down from an SLR for beginner's or photo student use, this solid starter camera is for you. I don't think you will be disappointed.The only downside is that it doesn't come with a carrying case or memory card, look for a kit for a better deal.

Reviews.Title: Fuji digital camera
Reviews.Author: Philip Smith "fisherman"
Reviews.Content: I have truly enjoyed my new Fuji camera and all of the extras it has on it. I have taken some awesome pictures and I really like the 12X zoom.

Reviews.Title: Low Light Quality
Reviews.Author: Peter Gordon "PAPG"
Reviews.Content: Regarding the FujiFilm FinePix S1000 fd, perhaps it is that I am not using the correct settings, but I don't find Low light pictures to my desired expectation. The pictures, although fairly sharp, are not homogeneously bright; there are shades of dullness. It does not measure up to the Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H20 under similar conditions, in terms of sharpness and brightness.

Reviews.Title: Best camera
Reviews.Author: Carlton J. Oliver
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera money can buy. Easy to use with lots of fearures. Large LCD window with option to use view finder.

Reviews.Title: dollar for dollar it can't be beat
Reviews.Author: W. Schult
Reviews.Content: After extended research the Fujifilm Finepix S1000fd seemed to be a great camera....and it definitely is.  The variety of functions make it a fine, versatile camera.  I took it on vacation shortly after receipt and I found it every bit as good as cameras costing much more.  I made a presentation from the photos taken on vacation and the viewers were amazed at the quality. Dollar for dollar I would recommend this camera to anyone as an easy-to-use camera that is as versatile as any I have owned.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera Fujifilm
Reviews.Author: Kevin L. Greer
Reviews.Content: This camera is awsome. Takes really great pictures , has all the features you could possibly want. Does a really good job with movies also.This is the first camera I have purchased in about 10 years or more.It couldn't be easier operation. The zoom on this thing is incredible.You could almost make a thimble look the size of a garbage can. Maybe a bit of a stretch. But you get the Idea. I am well pleased with my Purchase.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: D. Amarante
Reviews.Content: I got this camera on Tuesday and i just can say i love it!.... Is chubby but small nice settings, great pictures.... My friends and family love it, and also the price!!.... I have own Sony, canon, and Nikon.... just point and shoot ones but they cost me quite the same, but this one is loooots better!!!The image quality is amazing, the colors, the focus. I prefer to use my owns settings since Im not really into photography, so I also recommend to read the manual.I will upload some of my pics ;)

Reviews.Title: fujifilm finepix S1000fd
Reviews.Author: rotometer "fujifan"
Reviews.Content: Camera arrived quickly and the price was great! I've encountered no problems with the camera and realize it has great potential for very artful work, as the zoom range is fantastic. I wish it had an anti shake feature, especially for my wife for whom I purchased it, but no complaints so far. I also wish it gave battery life indication before it's so late in usable battery life. Still, it's a fine small camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Value...Lots of Features!
Reviews.Author: Ed P. Owens "Traveling Tech"
Reviews.Content: A friend bought a earlier version of this Fuji digital camera and it left a lasting impression...I finally bought mine after pricing around the web. This is an excellent camera for the price, great resolution, and it also shoots video clips! I purchased an 8GB video card on Amazon and it lets me shoot tons of stills and video. You will be hard pressed to find a better deal than what you will pay at Amazon...Plus you can get FREE 2-Day shipping.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous camera, was stolen within 2 weeks!
Reviews.Author: Anita Knox "Thrift Mom"
Reviews.Content: This camera was a gift for my aspiring 15 year old photographer daughter's birthday.  Unfortunately, it was stolen, along with her mp3 player while we were out to dinner celebrating my 14 year old son's birthday two weeks later.  She is heartbroken, and I am even more so, because I went over budget to get this in the first place and she was so excited and thrilled with it.  It is an amazing camera for the price though, and simple enough for a novice to figure out and use.  I bought the extra memory card for it, and rechargeable batteries, but if you run out of batteries, you can just use regular ones.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm Finepix #1000
Reviews.Author: Marci Carberry
Reviews.Content: Great camera! Researched Fuji  for their latest economical high optical zoom cameras to use in conjunction with my old Finepix 3800 which takes remarkable pictures. Well, the S1000 is even better - the zoom is phenomenall - the details and the colors - when compared side by side with my 3800 are even better. I shopped for best price and free shipping but of course always end up at Amazon.com for the best deal. I am still on a learning curve as it is quite different from the 3800 but the manual that came with it is fairly easy to read. I highly recommend this model and Fuji!

Reviews.Title: GOOD CAMERA GOOD PRICE
Reviews.Author: H. B. Kennell
Reviews.Content: I HAVE HAD THE FUJI FOR A COULPE OF WEEKS AND REALLY LIKE IT . IT FEELS GOOD IN YOUR HAND AND LOOKS GREAT. TAKES GOOD PIXS, EASY TO OPERATE,MANY FEATURES,SOME I AM STILL LEARNING ABOUT.CAN'T BEAT THE PRICE FOR A CAMERA LIKE THIS,AND GOT A FREE MEMORY CARD TOO.

Reviews.Title: Fuji finally offers SD card compatibility on its lineup
Reviews.Author: Buck Green
Reviews.Content: I formerly owned other Fuji cameras but did not like to have to use the more expensive and harder to find xD memory cards that apparently only Fuji and Olympus cameras use. With the new Fuji s1000fd and some of their other newer models, Fuji finally joins manufacturers like Kodak, Nikon, Canon, etc., in offering the use of the more popular SD card in its new lineup. Fuji quality shines in all other areas of this camera as well, including its excellent trademark ergonomic feel. The first few photos taken came out as excellent, as I expected. I am sure I will get a lot of delightful use from this camera.

Reviews.Title: Excelente Producto
Reviews.Author: Fred Guillén
Reviews.Content: Esta Cámara es excelente, la recomiendo.Eso si, es importante tener en cuenta que es una cámara grande y hay que tenerla gindada en el cuello; lo otro es que es un poco incomoda para tomar las fotos, por eso es muy recomendable utilizar trípode.De resto, es una excelente cámara, con 10Mpixel de resolución, el software que tiene es uno de los más avanzados y toma la foto perfecta.Creo que esta cámara es una de las mejores que he comprado.

Reviews.Title: Not a reliable camera
Reviews.Author: science girl
Reviews.Content: I have had other Fuji digital cameras before and I loved them. However, I have found this model to be troublesome. After 4 months of use, the camera has stopped working. I have looked at other sites and have found this to be an issue with this model. While it was working, I found the picture quality poor and the shutter speed to be delayed - causing me to miss quality moments. I have always liked Fuji cameras; however, I can not recommend this model.

Reviews.Title: Fuji Camera
Reviews.Author: R. Dice
Reviews.Content: Purchased Fuji S1000fd New, excellent price.  Very nice Camera,Excellent 12 power zoom,  Nice Panorama mode,  use NI-MH batteries and they will last a long time.Viewfinder has all information, same as rear screen,  viewfinder great for outdoors in sunlight.  I recommend this camera for the General picture taking.  It is easy to use and controls are simple to get useto.  I can find no fault in this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: H. A. Lawson "Non-stop reader"
Reviews.Content: What a deal!I was having a hard time figuring out which camera to get because I had a set $ amount in mind & really didn't want to go over it. For the Money this camera is just an incredible deal, it really can't be beat.The zoom, the LCD screen, the fact that it also had a viewfinder (This was very important to me because I didn't want to blow through the batteries by being forced to use the LCD screen all the time), the image stabilization,the face recognition software, the easy to understand references on the menu screens, the fact that the camera can use AA batteries. The action shots that this camera takes are awesome & the filming is a plus also, but not what I bought the camera for.I could go on & on but I won't so, if you're looking for a camera to take some really great pictures & video, this is it.For all the black screen pictures & super dark picture reports, I found them not to be true. For the people who reported the dark pictures, try switching the settings, (Appature or shutter speed) or use the flash. Heck take some time to learn what the camera does & take a lot of pictures, that might solve those problems.

Reviews.Title: Plus and Minus
Reviews.Author: computer jacques "leptonjim"
Reviews.Content: The pictures are great and the camera has a lot of easy to use features. I did have a lot of startup problems, though, and I almost sent the camera back. Apparently not all SD cards have been qualified with the camera and I tried four that I had in my stock before one that I had worked properly. The problem was that about half the time, after taking a flash picture, a "write error" would occur transferring the picture to the card. Sometimes, the camera would freeze up and the battery compartment would have to be opened to unfreeze it. These cards work in other cameras that I have.Once I started using the current card (a Toshiba 512 MB SD card) my problems went away. So far this is the only device I have used that has been sensitive to the type of SD card I use with it.

Reviews.Title: memory card problems
Reviews.Author: K. L. Figary
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for Christmas, at first it worked fine.  Then I put in the memory card. After taking a picture a "write error" pops up on the screen and it wont save my picture. I have since tried two different memory cards and checked to make sure they were the right ones, and the same thing happens. There is nothing in the book about this and I cannot figure out what the problem is.  What to do? I have a friend that got the same camera for Christmas and she is also having problems, although her's are different. Her camera keeps totally freezing.  I would not recommend this camera and I will probably return it.

Reviews.Title: Muy Buen producto
Reviews.Author: Maria D. De Chacin
Reviews.Content: Esta camara es muy sencilla de operar, ya mis nietos estan fascinados con ella y yo por consiguiente sin ser una experta he tomado fotografias preciosas de paisajes e inclusive videos.Debido a esta adquisición me estoy aficionando a la fotografía y es algo encantador ya que he obtenido algunas fotos espectaculares de este sitio donde estoy pasando vacaciones que es el Estado Merida en Venezuela.Recomiendo este producto que bien sirve para aficionados como para personas con conocimiento de fotografia............muy buena...la recomiendo 100%.

Reviews.Title: Camera Tyro - seems cool but don't know what half the stuff does
Reviews.Author: S. Pehrson "Inglo"
Reviews.Content: This is the first actual camera I've owned since I received a Kodak Instamatic from my Aunt at first communion in 1976.  I know nothing about cameras, though as a physicist, I know a little bit about optics.  I've taken some nice pictures and some bad pictures with this camera.  Leaving it set to auto does a good job.  When I've played around manually with the shutter speed and f-stop (as well as trying the natural light setting) I haven't had that great of results.  I'm sure that's more a result of my inexperience than anything lacking with the camera.Still feels like it was worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Fuji Finepix digital camera
Reviews.Author: L. Faye Lescalleet
Reviews.Content: This is a Christmas Gift and has not yet been used, but I have and older one that is only 10X optical and is a wonderful camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted!!
Reviews.Author: R. J. Easterly
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Fujifilm s1000fd as it has the features I most desired on a camera at a price I thought was reasonable.  I have spend the last month taking photgraphs of everything so I can get use to the capabilities of the camera.  So far, the only complaints I have are my own abilities.

Reviews.Title: lens cap
Reviews.Author: Peggy "Peggy"
Reviews.Content: I read reviews about the loose lens cap and bought this product anyway. I'm sorry I didn't listen and buy a different brand with an automatic closing lens instead. The cover comes off at the slightest touch or movement. It is most annoying!!! The pictures have been okay but the lens cover problem overshadows any of the good features.

Reviews.Title: Fuji missed the mark
Reviews.Author: Snowed in Vermont
Reviews.Content: Why do some camera manufacturers insist on using proprietary interfaces for consumer cameras?  Fuji blew it yet again by not using the standard USB mini-B cable but designing yet another special connector that doesn't interchange with anything else, even on their own models.  There doesn't seem to be a technical reason for this, since this is not a tiny camera, tight for space.The special cable alone would be enough reason to stay away from this camera, but Fuji double-cursed this little critter with a difficult to work battery cover with fragile catches.  These catches are molded into the bottom of the camera body as well as the battery cover.  Should these break, as mine have, you will either need to replace the entire body housing, which would, no doubt, cost more than the camera is worth, or toss it in the garbage and buy another camera.  I'm betting when you do, it won't be another S1000FD.If you haven't bought one yet, save yourself the hassles and look for something else.  Life's too short to spend rewarding manufacturers for bad design.

Reviews.Title: Ok, but died quickly with common problem
Reviews.Author: Nasha "Pamic on the streets of london"
Reviews.Content: This camera had good features except for the baterries, but I didnt get to explore it completeley as the camera had a fatal flaw. It died within a week with a common problem from Fuji cameras. The electronci lens stopped opening and caused a system error.As I searched, this appears to be a somewhat common problem with Fuji cameras so I dont plan to get another. Kudos to Amazon, though. Return and refund were processed quickly!

Reviews.Title: i HATE this camera!!!
Reviews.Author: K. Ashford
Reviews.Content: i absolutely despise this camera! yes, it takes good pictures, and yes, the panoramic setting is nice...things i hate about this camera:>the AUTO and video settings (the 2 most commonly used settings in our home) are on opposite sides of the settings dial. the previous fujifilm camera we had (finepix s700) had these two settings side by side, which was very convenient.> it seems like Fujifilm added features, but not a faster brain for this camera. it switches between settings VERY slowly and is slow to write images to the memory.> you can't zoom while shooting video. seriously? this may not be important to everyone, but for us, it's essential. our fujifilm s700 zooms beautifully while shooting video clips. this is a nice feature to have when you're trying to catch your toddler in action!i have very few nice things to say about this camera other than it takes nice pictures...but you can get very high quality pictures in less expensive cameras, and they'd be easier to use too!

Reviews.Title: fujifilm finepix s1000fd
Reviews.Author: Virginia R. Wark "virgkw"
Reviews.Content: I bought a refurbished model. it works well for my needs. I love the zoom,  the compact size, the different settings are good if I want to play around artistically and the auto is great to shoot on the fly. focus and response time means I don't loose a shot waiting for the camera there's a miniscule recovery time between shots ( i don't have the preview on)video is ok for my day to day stuff. I have this camera to take anywhere put it in a ziplock bag and go out on the water kayaking take pictures and video all in one perfect.good day to day camera.

Reviews.Title: very pleased
Reviews.Author: Andrea Harris
Reviews.Content: I would like to say "I am very pleased with my fujifilm finepix". I am so glad I bought the camera. I was able to get some good pics of my grandpa before he passed away. Thanks for a great camera.

Reviews.Title: better hope it doesnt need repaired
Reviews.Author: so disgusted with fujifilm
Reviews.Content: I had this camera for about 6 mnths when the latch on the battery hatch broke, it wasnt covered under warrenty so fujifilm was going to charge me almost 100.00 to fix it. I just had it shipped back, i would rather buy another camera/another brand for 100.00 before i paid them that.  The camera itself only takes mediocre pictures so it is definitely not worth what it cost.

Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera right before I went to Cancun, Mexico and I'm glad I did. The pictures this camera can take is beautiful! The detail you can get is perfect. I purchased the camera from Amazon because they were cheapest on the product. Also, I have never had a problem with Amazon. And, Amazon is great about getting your order to you fast.

I recommend this product mostly for semi-professional pictures and family pictures as well.

Reviews.Title: I am satisfied 100 percent of this product.
Reviews.Author: Robert Blais
Reviews.Content: The company send me this product in few days, The Camera was for a gift. The person who receved it was very happy, and find this camera not to difficult to operate...and enjoy taking  pictures...very happy with the cam.

Reviews.Title: great price, great camera
Reviews.Author: Richard Kauffman
Reviews.Content: its a great camera. Very good quality, the 12x zoom is awesome for far away shots. I am glad i bought this camera, I would recommend to friends for sure

Reviews.Title: Nothing Better for the price!
Reviews.Author: Vlad "Vlad Dracul"
Reviews.Content: What can I say, saved $100.00 over retail locally, plus the features are just amazing for such a small camera. Only complaint is the lack of a touch screen, nonetheless, one of the best cameras around.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: M. Brummitt
Reviews.Content: I haved used this for a while now and I have had no problems with it at all.The only down side I see about it is I can't find any or they don't make filters for this model.Still has been well worth money to me.

Reviews.Title: Good basic digital camera
Reviews.Author: George Weyer
Reviews.Content: Our Finepix S1000fd was purchase in order to have a lightweight back-up camera for our Nikon SLR. We purchased this camera based on our positive experience with one of the previous models in this Fuji line. This camera is also very nice. The controls are all well placed and intuitive to use. The video is of decent quality. The new "panoramic" picture feature is interesting. It is very simple to do and allows for some creative photo composition. The image quality and zoom are all of acceptable quality.The only negative aspect of the camera design is that the flash does not automatically pop up in auto-flash mode. The user has to release the flash by pushing an additional button on the right base of the flash housing. This isn't a terribly big deal but it is unusual enough that I have forgotten about it multiple times.

Reviews.Title: PROFESSIONAL PICTURES!!!!
Reviews.Author: N. Hinton
Reviews.Content: I am not a professional photographer, but after using this camera i should be....this camera takes perfect photos....very pleased with fuji....

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: K. Durham
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures my family and I love it. The sport function for taking action shots s great

Reviews.Title: My New Camera

Reviews.Content: It's an excellent product, easy to handle and to work with, I am enjoying it a lot I recommend it for all kind of peopleLuis

Reviews.Content: i was very excited when i did the pictures and saw it in the lcd. i was thinking wow what nice colorfull pics. but when i dowload it was very disapointing. blurry pics almost of the time.i did like the out doors only. not indoors

Reviews.Title: Photos Out of Focus
Reviews.Author: David M. Fogel
Reviews.Content: I was excited about buying this camera.  It had the same statistics as a Nikon that was about three times the price.  Got the camera all set up, put in in "Auto" mode and went up to the Sierra Nevada mountains to take some pictures of the snow-capped peaks.  Everything seemed to go okay.  But when I got home and downloaded the images to my computer, all of the photos were slightly out of focus.  I remember being careful not to cover the autofocus sensor with my finger, so that wasn't the problem.  I took several photos around the house and back yard in different modes, but all of the photos were, again, slightly out of focus.  If you're looking for critically-sharp images, buy another camera that has a lens you can manually focus.  I've recently read that a 10 megapixel camera with autofocus is likely to produce blurry images due to the millions of pixels.

Reviews.Title: The Fuji Blues
Reviews.Author: John Hellier
Reviews.Content: I owned this camera recently, and sent it back. Buy a Canon, or Sony. don't waste your time with this one. The reviews on this one are right on, believe me, I know. I purchased the real deal this time, so should you. Don't buy it.

Reviews.Title: Fugi Finepics Camera
Reviews.Author: Eileen A. Heughins "grandmother of 5"
Reviews.Content: This camera is great. It is small but very durable and takes great pictures. Ease of use is for me.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Alberto Bencivenni
Reviews.Content: We had a Fujifilm s5000 and got wondeful pictures of our two kids, the only reason to upgrade was the 3 megapixel resolution.We decided to give the s5000 as a gift to my brother and purchase the new one s1000fd: we had never taken a picture even comparable to the quality of the old one (both in AUTO mode)!Now I don't know even how to ask to my brother to give the s5000 back...We have just decided to replace it with a different one, 3 months of pictures of our kids not a top level quality are enough.Alberto

Reviews.Title: Disappointment
Reviews.Author: Roberto Vicente "bodhiu"
Reviews.Content: I've had other Fuji cameras and I was always happy with them.  But this one turned out a complete dud.  I played around with it for a week, tweaking the colors and exposure (I'm an experienced photographer) but it always looked like a child had crayoned in the colors.  I returned the camera.  Go with the Canon Powershot S3 or S5.

Reviews.Title: amazon and fujifilm S1000fd camera
Reviews.Author: Michael E. Griffin "Mike Griffin"
Reviews.Content: The camera based on limited use seems to be a well engineered item.  I would much prefer a complete written instruction book though rather than the supplied cd in pdf format.My opinion of Amazon though now stinks.  I got the camera on 9/17/08. As of 10/6/08, the price has been cut twice by a total of $20 and they refuse to credit me the difference.

Reviews.Title: I hate this camera with a fiery passion...
Reviews.Author: J. Kronenberg
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace my much loved Fuji E550 that took an unfortunate swim. I primarily used my camera for family photos and sold the occasional stock image. I would have bought another E550, but, I figured, hey, why not upgrade so that I can produce more shots to sell as stock photos? Well, if you want to do anything with your pictures beside put them into a family photo album DON'T buy this camera. I have tried various indoor lighting setups with photography bulbs, I've tried natural light, I bought the light stands and photo box. I've tried everything I can think of to coax a usable photo out of this camera.Basically, auto mode is unusable. You'll get a clear image, but the colors are so incorrect that it's ridiculous. Greens look brown, brown looks iridescent gray and it can't render striped textures. Blues look washed out while skin tone looks orange. I cannot use this camera to take a basic stock photo because the noise levels at the best settings are too high. Well, I figured I'll just use it for my ebay listings. Well, guess what, I can't do that with it either. The color rendering is so bad that it takes me about 10 minutes per photo to fix them to make them even ebay worthy.With manual mode, you can take a few decent outdoor photos. BUT, the whole point of buying a point and shoot is to be able to point and shoot and still get a somewhat decent photo. That's something this camera cannot accomplish.I don't see how a camera that is technically better then my old one can create photos that are actually worse then the ones I used to get out of my very first, 'bottom of the barrel' $89 digital camera. From the specifications, this camera should be able to do so much more. My 4 megapixel E550 took MUCH better photos.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm Finepix S1000fd 10MP
Reviews.Author: Cesar L. Aguillon "Big boss"
Reviews.Content: Fujifilm Finepix S1000fd 10MP Digital Camera with 12x Optical ZoomCamera is hard to manage,  close ups almost impossible , quality is just not there.

Reviews.Title: NO AUTO POP UP FLASH RU kidd'n me!
Reviews.Author: mike C
Reviews.Content: Overall everything works fine but I cannot help but feel that Fuji knowingly hides the fact that the flash has to be popped up manually.  This especially annoying since the 700 had a true automatic pop up flash.  SHAME on FUJI.  This will be my last Fuji camera.  There are to many better thought out makes and models available.

Reviews.Title: You need the exactly quantity of light
Reviews.Author: Electronic Engineering "trying to be objective"
Reviews.Content: This camera take very good photos, but only with the exactly quantity of ligh. For example if the scene is dark with Flas the photo is saturate of light and on the contrary without flash the photo looks yello-dark using ISO 3200 and the resolution is 3M pixel.Summarizing the dinamic range of light to take wonderfull photos is sharp or narrow. I supposed that this is the reason to cost around 220 dollars

Reviews.Title: problem from the start

Reviews.Content: I purchased this item for my wife. It was to be a 1st year wedding annv. gift. I should have checked it out first but I didn't and has fate would have it the camera never worked. We are at dinner and I give her a gift that doesn't even work...thanks alot FUJIFILM!#@*&^!

Reviews.Title: Horrible Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: P. Lee "thiscuriouscandy"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera based on other people's review, I guess I was wrong to listen to the opinion of others because this camera sucks. I took it on a trip to Florida and the quality was horrible and the zoom did not even work. I've purchased many expensive camera(s) such as Nikon and I have to admit, don't go cheap because cheap doesn't always offer you good quality photo's. I will never buy another Fuji camera or another cheap one, because it's just not worth my time or value. Lastly, I returned the camera and Amazon was amazing at refunding the full amount I paid for the camera with no problem what so ever.
